data.actual_result: The server name text is cut off
data.expected_result: The server name for the emotes will show at the top
data.short_description: Opening the emoji menu when uploading a file at max font size and zoom is cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Set zoom and font size to the max - Click the + at a text channel and select a file to upload - open the emoji menu - Scroll a bit down - Look at the server name at the top of the emotes
